artist: Jack Lenor Larsen Inc.; Jack Lenor Larsen, Inc.
description: Fabric variations using "Orange Malachite" warp of orange and yellow-orange threads. Orange & gold warp.  Random-length bands of Lt. blue,white, olive with metallic green, metallic green with drk. tan, and yellow weft.  Plain weave variation. (orange & gold  with variety)
